mapper.insert: INSERT INTO logans_field (task_id, file_key, file_remark) VALUES (#{taskId}, #{fileKey}, #{fileRemark})
mapper.select:
SELECT id, task_id taskId, file_key fileKey, file_remark fileRemark FROM logans_field WHERE 1 = 1
AND task_id = #{taskId}
AND file_key LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fileKey}, '%')
AND file_remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{fileRemark}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
